title: First Look: Hugo Ekitike wears Liverpool Red after official move
text:
Liverpool have finally got their man as they signed Hugo Ekitike from Eintracht Frankfurt on a €95 million deal. The huge amount is for the talent they are pursuing and for the next season titles. The reigning champions of Premier League isn’t stopping in the summer transfer window as they already did 4 top class signings. The club is expected to go for few more signings as Arne Slot wants a huge change in the squad.
Liverpool have made a major statement in the summer transfer window by completing the signing of Hugo Ekitike from Eintracht Frankfurt in a blockbuster €95 million deal. The 22-year-old French forward had been on the Reds’ radar for months, and they’ve finally got their man.
Ekitike’s arrival signals Liverpool’s ambition under new manager Arne Slot, who is keen to reshape the squad in pursuit of more silverware. The reigning Premier League champions have now made four top-class signings this window, with Ekitike becoming the marquee addition.
The hefty price tag reflects both the talent Ekitike possesses and the club’s long-term vision. A dynamic and versatile attacker, he is expected to add flair and firepower to Liverpool’s frontline, which already boasts the likes of Mohamed Salah and Darwin Núñez.
